function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among guinea pigs due to ventilation and ionization of air","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases like TB among guinea pig population, leading to illness, mortality, and contamination of the environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures, regular health monitoring, and air treatment to minimize the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Quarantine protocols, air purification systems, and regular health assessments","People":"Guinea pig handlers, researchers, and animal facility staff","Owner":"Research institution, animal facility management"},{"Description":"Exposure to ozone from ionizers","Impact":"Health risks to guinea pigs and humans from prolonged exposure to high ozone levels","Mitigation":"Monitor and control ozone levels, limit exposure duration, and provide ventilation in the ionizer area","Technologies":"Ozone monitors, ventilation systems, and exposure duration control mechanisms","People":"Guinea pig handlers, researchers, and animal facility staff","Owner":"Research institution, animal facility management"},{"Description":"Risk of improper handling and disposal of infected animals","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to other animals, humans, and the environment if infected animals are not properly handled and disposed of","Mitigation":"Establish proper handling and disposal protocols, provide training to staff, and maintain biosecurity measures","Technologies":"Biosecurity protocols, training programs, and proper disposal facilities","People":"Guinea pig handlers, researchers, and animal facility staff","Owner":"Research institution, animal facility management"}]}
